title: Bora-Hansgrohe Picks Up One of Jumbo-Visma’s Top Coaches to Back Primož Roglič’s Grand Tour Goals
content:
Marc Lamberts also coached Wout van Aert, and will cross over with Roglič to join the German squad.

Read the full article at Bora-Hansgrohe Picks Up One of Jumbo-Visma’s Top Coaches to Back Primož Roglič’s Grand Tour Goals on Velo.
author: ahood
